title: He Hired 2 Men to Kidnap His Wife. They Ended Up Drowning.
abstract: Lawrence Handley, 53, a business executive from Lafayette, La., pleaded guilty this week to three criminal charges after a plot to kidnap his estranged wife went badly awry.

title: Gloria Vanderbilt’s Beekman Place Apartment Is for Sale
abstract: Anderson Cooper is selling his mother’s perpetually reimagined two-bedroom, where she lived for nearly 25 years, for $1.125 million.
des_facet: ['Interior Design and Furnishings', 'Real Estate and Housing (Residential)']

abstract: The U.S. seems to be in the middle of a pervasive psychological decline.

title: After a Tragic Beginning, a ‘Happily Ever After’
abstract: Jaclyn Katz didn’t expect to find romance from a dating app — until she met Michael Sacks. She felt comfortable enough with him to share a childhood trauma.

title: Trump Pressed Justice Dept. to Declare Election Results Corrupt, Notes Show
abstract: “Leave the rest to me” and to congressional allies, the former president is said to have told top law enforcement officials.

title: They Spurned the Vaccine. Now They Want You to Know They Regret It.
abstract: People who once rejected the vaccine or simply waited too long are now grappling with the consequences, often in raw, public ways.

title: We’re Ben and Jerry. Men of Ice Cream, Men of Principle.
abstract: We support the company's decision to end the sale of its ice cream in the occupied Palestinian territories.
byline: By Bennett Cohen and Jerry Greenfield
